alert.note: Alert for Bell; Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 02 at 7:33PM CST until March 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Milam County in central Texas... Southeastern Bell County in central Texas... * Until 800 PM CST. * At 733 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Bartlett, or near Granger, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Rogers around 755 PM CST. Buckholts around 800 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Edgeworth, Val Verde, Sharp, Sparks, Davilla, Prairie Dell and Leedale. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 279. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
